title: Web Developer-Internship
description: At PUMO TECHNOVATION INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED-TAMBARAM, I worked on developing and maintaining web applications using PHP and MYSQL. I also assisted in optimizing performance of existing web applications.

title: Freelance - Web Developer
